contentList.content: Your carrying capacity is increased by [1]%.

After <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashing</LSTag> or taking a similar action, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> once that turn without using a bonus action.
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to [1] enemies at once.
